pr_title: GeoSPARQL: Malformed geo:lat and geo:lon checks

timeline.message: SpatialObjectGeometryLiteral now checks for multiple geo:lat or geo:lon predicates on a Feature. Exception thrown and iterator closed.
SpatialIndex: retrieval of geo:lat and geo:lon are now required properties to replace NullPointerException with PropertyNotFoundException.

timeline.author: afs
